Subject: VDI performing slow
Description: We recently made a change on one of the Group by enabling  ( Advance Printing and MTP scanning )  so that if any user try to print any sensitive information , than it should triggered an alert on EPP console . This Group which includes  VDIs only and after  enabling that setting ,  we have experienced extreme  slowness on all  VDIs ( both from Win 10 and Win 11 ) . We  turned off this setting and apparently the problem of slowness has been resolved .  We  want to ask from EPP support that if this printing setting was the cause of the problem .
What_We_Know__c:
during the remote session, we checked all Citrix services running on a terminal and created the MTP scanning exception app list.
the customer needs to raise an internal change request in order to enable the setting and as I proposed we should have the meeting right when the setting gets enabled so we can gather logs.
Next_Steps__c: waiting on the customer to create a change request internally so we can test the exception list
Solution_Comment__c: The slowness was fixed with the items added to the scanning exception list
